byline: Kai Ryssdal, David Gura, Queena Kim, Mitchell Hartman and Adrienne Hill
teaser: The Labor Participation Rate hasn’t been this low since the late 1970s.  Who's in? Who's out? Target has upped the total number of customers impacted by its two-and-a-half week data breach to 70 million. A staggering figure that’s a reminder of the volume of shopping that happens in the U.S. consumer economy. California's state budget famously sank during the recession. Now that the state has just as famously turned it around and has a revenue surplus, Gov. Jerry Brown wants the state to pay down debts it piled up during the bad years.

title: Marketplace for Friday, January 10, 2014
